mapper.sql: ID, AREA_CODE, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, TOWN, VILLAGE, STREET, NOTE, STATE, OPERATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
from dictionary_areacode where areaCode=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.state='1'

select
from dictionary_areacode where areaCode like '%'#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}'%' and #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} is not null and #{nextArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} is null and t.state='1'
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary_areacode (ID, AREA_CODE, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, TOWN, VILLAGE, STREET, NOTE, STATE, OPERATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dictionary_areacode set AREA_CODE = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN = #{town,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE = #{village,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
